shortdesc.ph: Retrieves detailed information about an extension.
Gets detailed information about the plugin.
Retrieves detailed information about the extension.
Gets detailed information of the extension.

p.codeblock: abstract getExtensionProperty( provider: string, extension: string, key: string, bufLen: number, type?: MediaSourceType ): string;
abstract getExtensionProperty( provider: string, extension: string, key: string, bufLen: number, type?: MediaSourceType ): string;
Future<String> getExtensionProperty( {required String provider, required String extension, required String key, required int bufLen, MediaSourceType type = MediaSourceType.unknownMediaSource});
public abstract int GetExtensionProperty(string provider, string extension, string key, ref string value, int buf_len, MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE type = MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE.UNKNOWN_MEDIA_SOURCE);

section.title: Timing
section.p: Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: Name of the extension provider.
Name of the extension.
Key of the extension property.
Media source type of the extension. See .
Maximum length of the extension property JSON string. Maximum is 512 bytes.
The name of the plugin provider.
The name of the plugin.
The key of the plugin property.
The media source type of the plugin. See .
The maximum length of the plugin property JSON string. Maximum value is 512 bytes.
The name of the extension provider.
The name of the extension.
The key of the extension property.
The media source type of the extension. See .
The maximum length of the extension property JSON string. The maximum value is 512 bytes.
Output parameter. The name of the extension provider.
Output parameter. The name of the extension.
Output parameter. The key of the extension property.
Output parameter. The value corresponding to the extension property key.
The media source type of the extension. See .
The maximum length of the extension property JSON string. Maximum value: 512 bytes.

ul.li: If the method call succeeds, returns the extension information.
If the method call fails, returns an empty string.
If the method call succeeds, returns the plugin information.
If the method call fails, returns an empty string.
If the method call succeeds, returns the extension information.
If the method call fails, returns an empty string.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
